faq.question: What is the difference between a recurring and a non-recurring event ?
faq.answer:
A recurring event automatically repeats at a defined interval (e.g., every week, every month).
A non-recurring event has a start date and an end date and must be created manually for each occurrence.

faq.question: How do I create a recurring event ?
faq.answer: From the event creation page, enable the 'Recurring' option, then choose the frequency (week, month, year, or custom).

faq.question: How do I edit or delete a single occurrence of an event ?
faq.answer: Long press on the specific event line (the sub-entry with its dates) and modify it directly — this will not affect other occurrences.

faq.question: Where is my data stored ?
faq.answer:
Planix automatically stores your data locally on your device in the Download → Planix → Backup folder.
You can also enable Google Drive backup to retrieve it on another phone.

faq.question: How do I back up my data to Google Drive ?
faq.answer: Go to Settings → Data → Backup and Restore, then confirm the backup by clicking the 'Backup' button.

faq.question: How do I restore a backup ?
faq.answer: From Settings → Data → Backup and Restore, click the 'Restore' button. You will then have the option to restore from a local backup or Google Drive if available.

faq.question: How do I change the app theme ?
faq.answer: Go to Settings → General → Theme, and choose between light and dark themes.

faq.question: How do I change the app language ?
faq.answer: Go to Settings → General → Language, then select French or English.

faq.question: Why do I need to sign in with Google ?
faq.answer:
Google Sign-In is used only to access your Drive space and store backups.
No other personal data is collected.

faq.question: Can I use Planix without signing in ?
faq.answer:
Yes. You can use it fully in local mode.
Google Sign-In is optional but recommended for automatic backups.

faq.question: How do I view the history of my events ?
faq.answer:
Open the details of an event from the main menu.
You will see the full list of your past and upcoming events.

faq.question: How do I view the event graph ?
faq.answer:
Open the details of an event from the main menu.
If your event already has at least 2 completed event lines, you will see the 'View on Graph' button appear next to the history.

faq.question: How do I read the event graph ?
faq.answer:
The graph shows the duration of your events over time.
Each point represents an event line.

faq.question: What is in the trash ?
faq.answer:
The trash keeps deleted events for 30 days before permanent deletion.
You can restore them from Settings → Data → Trash.

faq.question: How do I contact Planix support ?
faq.answer: Go to About → Help → Contact Support.
